title: In core technology, what are the most cores a laptop has? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to your question you want to know how much cores a laptop can havethe budget laptop nowadays have 2 core cpu with virtual cores that is 2+2 so 4 cores on a budget laptop. ex: i5 2nd gen i3 8th gen.on midrange laptops they have 4 core cpu with virtual cores that is 4+4 so 8 cores. ex: i5 10th gen and i7 8th genon flagship laptops they have around 8 cores or 6 cores means either 16 cores or 12 cores ex: i9 10th gen amd ryzen 9 series so a laptop can have from 2 cores to 16 cores depending on processor. Hope this helps.And please Upvote this if you found it helpful.
